Class ClassRepositoryLoader<T extends Storable>

java.lang.Object

Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionRepositoryLoader, BehaviorRepositoryLoader, CommunicationModuleRepositoryLoader, EmotionModuleRepositoryLoader, PerceptionModuleRepositoryLoader, PlanningModuleRepositoryLoader, ReasoningModuleRepositoryLoader
public abstract class ClassRepositoryLoader<T extends Storable>
extends java.lang.Object

A class to gather common code from Class Loaders. It aims at loading all the files matching criteria in the given folder.

Author:
Sylvain Cambon
